title: Rank Badge, 15th–16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry or k'ossu)
description: Half of a rank badge with parts of two white birds against a cloud background, in shades of blue, orange, yellow and white on a gold ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Rank Badge, 15th–16th century.
15th–16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry or k'ossu). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-419.
